job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As an Exam Developer, you coordinate all the activities related to developing new exams, translating existing exams to several different languages, updating the exams to current standards during maintenance, and implementing exam products in the various systems. In addition, you review the quality of the exams through item and test analysis. You work on all exams that form part of EXIN's certification portfolio.
   Importantly, you will collaborate closely with the Exam Developers to integrate generative AI solutions into our processes. You can translate internal guidelines into machine learning algorithms while maintaining legal, qualitative and ethical compliance in the outcomes. You stay up to date with the latest research and developments in the field of AI and machine learning., * Coordinating work with subject matter experts and cooperating with third parties in creating, localizing, implementing and maintaining exam products
     * Ensuring that deliverables are in line with high-quality standards, are within budget, and delivered on time
     * (Co)developing and improving exam products in line with guidelines for educational measurement
     * Testing exam products (exams and corresponding materials) for the other team members
     * Independently writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms complying with standards, best practices and company policies
     * Supporting our Customer Success Center by preparing responses to customer questions on the content of the exams
     * Detecting (using test analysis) and resolving issues related to the exam products, and performing root cause analyses to take corrective actions
     * Keeping your knowledge in the domain up-to-date
     * Representing EXIN through attending (online) events
job_details.full_text:
Software Improvement Group Exam Developer

As an Exam Developer, you coordinate all the activities related to developing new exams, translating existing exams to several different languages, updating the exams to current standards during maintenance, and implementing exam products in the various systems. In addition, you review the quality of the exams through item and test analysis. You work on all exams that form part of EXIN's certification portfolio.
   Importantly, you will collaborate closely with the Exam Developers to integrate generative AI solutions into our processes. You can translate internal guidelines into machine learning algorithms while maintaining legal, qualitative and ethical compliance in the outcomes. You stay up to date with the latest research and developments in the field of AI and machine learning., * Coordinating work with subject matter experts and cooperating with third parties in creating, localizing, implementing and maintaining exam products
     * Ensuring that deliverables are in line with high-quality standards, are within budget, and delivered on time
     * (Co)developing and improving exam products in line with guidelines for educational measurement
     * Testing exam products (exams and corresponding materials) for the other team members
     * Independently writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms complying with standards, best practices and company policies
     * Supporting our Customer Success Center by preparing responses to customer questions on the content of the exams
     * Detecting (using test analysis) and resolving issues related to the exam products, and performing root cause analyses to take corrective actions
     * Keeping your knowledge in the domain up-to-date
     * Representing EXIN through attending (online) events

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on exam development, localization, and quality assurance within an educational context. While it mentions integrating generative AI and writing machine learning algorithms, these appear to be secondary tasks supporting the core function of exam development, rather than the primary focus of an AI engineering role.

phrases.phrase: coordinate all the activities related to developing new exams
phrases.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of the overall process and goals of exam development, aligning with the business context.

phrases.phrase: translating existing exams to several different languages
phrases.justification: This involves understanding the business need for localization and adapting content accordingly.

phrases.phrase: updating the exams to current standards during maintenance
phrases.justification: This shows an understanding of evolving business requirements and the need to keep products relevant.

phrases.phrase: implementing exam products in the various systems
phrases.justification: This implies understanding how exam products fit into broader systems and business processes.

phrases.phrase: review the quality of the exams through item and test analysis
phrases.justification: This demonstrates an understanding of quality metrics and business objectives related to exam effectiveness.

phrases.phrase: work on all exams that form part of EXIN's certification portfolio
phrases.justification: This shows an understanding of the scope and strategic importance of the work within the organization's offerings.

phrases.phrase: Ensuring that deliverables are in line with high-quality standards, are within budget, and delivered on time
phrases.justification: This directly relates to understanding and meeting business constraints and objectives.

phrases.phrase: Supporting our Customer Success Center by preparing responses to customer questions on the content of the exams
phrases.justification: This involves understanding customer needs and business support functions.

phrases.phrase: Representing EXIN through attending (online) events
phrases.justification: This indicates a role in external communication and understanding the company's market presence.

phrases.phrase: translate internal guidelines into machine learning algorithms
phrases.justification: This involves the process of creating or adapting algorithms based on specific requirements.

phrases.phrase: Independently writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms
phrases.justification: This directly refers to the core activity of developing and managing ML models.

phrases.phrase: Detecting (using test analysis) and resolving issues related to the exam products, and performing root cause analyses
phrases.justification: While primarily analytical, test analysis can involve statistical modeling to understand performance and identify issues.

phrases.phrase: implementing exam products in the various systems
phrases.justification: This suggests integrating exam products into existing software systems.

phrases.phrase: cooperating with third parties in creating, localizing, implementing and maintaining exam products
phrases.justification: This implies working with external systems or developers for implementation.

phrases.phrase: maintaining machine learning algorithms
phrases.justification: This implies ongoing management and upkeep of deployed algorithms, which is a component of MLOps.

phrases.phrase: Detecting (using test analysis) and resolving issues related to the exam products, and performing root cause analyses to take corrective actions
phrases.justification: Monitoring, identifying, and resolving issues in production systems is a key aspect of MLOps.

phrases.phrase: coordinate all the activities related to developing new exams
phrases.justification: Coordination implies communication and collaboration with various parties.

phrases.phrase: translating existing exams to several different languages
phrases.justification: Localization requires understanding and communicating nuances across languages and cultures.

phrases.phrase: collaborate closely with the Exam Developers
phrases.justification: Explicit mention of collaboration.

phrases.phrase: Coordinating work with subject matter experts and cooperating with third parties
phrases.justification: Directly states coordination and cooperation.

phrases.phrase: Supporting our Customer Success Center by preparing responses to customer questions
phrases.justification: Requires clear communication to support external inquiries.

phrases.phrase: Representing EXIN through attending (online) events
phrases.justification: External representation requires strong communication skills.

phrases.phrase: updating the exams to current standards during maintenance
phrases.justification: Implies adapting to new standards and requirements.

phrases.phrase: stay up to date with the latest research and developments in the field of AI and machine learning
phrases.justification: Directly states the need for continuous learning.

phrases.phrase: Keeping your knowledge in the domain up-to-date
phrases.justification: Explicit requirement for continuous learning.

phrases.phrase: review the quality of the exams through item and test analysis
phrases.justification: Analysis implies problem identification and understanding.

phrases.phrase: Detecting (using test analysis) and resolving issues related to the exam products, and performing root cause analyses to take corrective actions
phrases.justification: Directly describes problem-solving, issue detection, and corrective actions.

phrases.phrase: Independently writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms
phrases.justification: Requires problem-solving to translate guidelines into functional algorithms.

phrases.phrase: maintaining legal, qualitative and ethical compliance in the outcomes
phrases.justification: Explicitly mentions legal, qualitative, and ethical compliance.

phrases.phrase: complying with standards, best practices and company policies
phrases.justification: Adherence to established rules and guidelines.

phrases.phrase: coordinate all the activities related to developing new exams
phrases.justification: Implies taking ownership of the exam development process.
